title: General Knowledge
description: A collection of medium-difficulty facts ranging from history to corporate origins.

questions.text: Who is a co-founder of music streaming service Spotify?

When did the website 'Facebook' launch?
What English word means to 'think deeply'?

What is a dead mall?
options: A mall that has been condemned
A mall with high vacancy rates or low consumer foot traffic

questions.text: What is the romanized Russian word for 'winter'?
In the Morse code, which letter is indicated by 3 dots?
